cab.content: (This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)ilitary Secret.711fuii i a^Y^r F?*o??i Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 1 ' " ' " ' 18th March 1918.3523. Mari situation. On 15th March our aeroplanes from Dera Ghazi Khan side, bombed tribesmen at Nahar and Vitakri.1On morning of 15th March, enemy about 1,000 strong, attacked Fort Munro and were repulsed with some loss, our casualties being one killed, three wounded. Chotiali2 village looted by Mari on the night of 13th-14th March. Advanced position of Duki force commenced movement towards Gtumbaz 16th March.1 In Khetran country, 34 and 42 miles respectively south-west of Fort Muiiro, 2 Two miles south-west of Gnmbaz.if/ f
